mapper.select: select r.comcodename,r.comcode FROM insbagreementzone as a LEFT JOIN insbregion AS r ON r.comcode = a.province WHERE a.agreementid=#{agreementid} GROUP BY a.province
select r.comcodename,r.comcode FROM insbagreementzone as a LEFT JOIN insbregion AS r ON r.comcode = a.city WHERE a.agreementid=#{agreementid} and a.province=#{comcode} GROUP BY a.city
update INSBAgreementzone set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},agreementid = #{agreementid},province = #{province},city = #{city} where id = #{id}
select city from INSBAgreementzone where agreementid=#{agreementid}
